title: Disenchant skin
body: I Disenchant from mistake a RARE skin, do someone know how ca I get it back?! :( :(

replies.body:
Ooof, accidentally disenchanting a rare shard is terrible! D:

We *may* be able to help out if you submit a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for our specialists to investigate. I can't make any promises, but reaching out in a ticket is the best thing to do right now. Feel free to reference this post's URL in your ticket.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Riot is usually giving back skins that are sold or disenchanted by a mistake.So, i guess they will give it back to you
Thx mate but what should I do now?! Just wait?! :D
My friend made a same mistake and he got a skin back.So i guess you just need to wait until they see this.

Unfortunately, no, you can't get it back. I remember Riot Support staff saying that they can't recovered lost Hextech materials.
